Great_Falls.KXGF:
KXGF (1400 AM, "Fox Sports Radio 1400 AM & 98.3 FM") is a sports radio station in Great Falls, Montana.


== History ==
The station was recently converted to the ESPN format from classical music. On December 26, 2009, KXGF changed their format to hot adult contemporary, branded as "Star 98.3" using FM translator K252EW 's frequency in its branding.
